inputs.description: -mask mset   Means to use the dataset 'mset' as a mask: Only voxels with nonzero values in 'mset' will be averaged from 'dataset'.  Note that the mask dataset and the input dataset must have the same number of voxels.
inputs.name: MASK

inputs.description: -set x y z   After computing the CM of the dataset, set the origin fields in the header so that the CM will be at (x,y,z) in DICOM coords.
inputs.name: SET

inputs.description: -local_ijk   Output values as (i,j,k) in local orienation.
inputs.name: LOCAL_IJK

inputs.description: -roi_vals v0 v1 v2 ... : Compute center of mass for each blob with voxel value of v0, v1, v2, etc. This option is handy for getting ROI centers of mass.
inputs.name: ROI_VALS

inputs.description: -all_rois     Don't bother listing the values of ROIs you want the program will find all of them and produce a full list. NOTE: Masking options are ignored with -roi_vals and -all_rois  ++ Compile date = Sep  7 2018 {:}
inputs.name: ALL_ROIS
